title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Baker Mayfield's statement on social media questioning his future with the Browns and why this was a smart move by Mayfield. He believes one NFL team is going to make a big mistake by overpaying for this star player in free agency. He gives out his first set of predictions on which teams will make the NFL playoffs in 2022. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Greg Olsen joins the show to discuss Russell Wilson's impact on Denver's free agency moves and attracting other star players. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
